If you're fired as CEO, you're sent away with a large severance package and told to shut up if you want to keep it.On his Twitter feed, Eric Schmidt wrote: Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! And that's exactly what's happened here. Eric Schmidt is stepping down so Larry and Sergey Brin can run the company they founded.
